title: Public transport for Round 18 of the 2024 AFL Season
articleContent:
Public transport is the best way to get to the game during Round 18 of the 2024 AFL season!

We're running extra services to and from the MCG and Marvel Stadium.

Plan your trip to the game using Journey planner.

Round 18 matches

Collingwood v Geelong, MCG, Friday 12 July at 7:40pm

Western Bulldogs v Carlton, Marvel Stadium, Saturday 13 July at 4:35pm

Melbourne v Essendon, MCG, Saturday 13 July at 7:30pm

Richmond v GWS Giants, MCG, Sunday 14 July at 3:20pm

Plan your journey

Set your location to plan your journey to and from Marvel Stadium or the MCG.

Before you travel

We strongly encourage you to register your myki. With a registered myki you can protect your myki balance if the card is lost or stolen, check your travel history and manage multiple myki cards in the one account.

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.
